official_title: Evaluation of a Novel Optical Microscope with a Deep Depth of Field (DeepDOF) to Provide Histologic-quality Images on Cervical Biopsies and Loop Electrosurgical Excision Procedure (LEEP) Specimens At the Point-of-care
inclusion_criteria:
1. Women aged 25 - 49 years
2. women undergoing cervical biopsy and/or LEEP
3. Women who are not pregnant and with a negative pregnancy test (within 3 days of enrollment)
4. Willing and capable of providing informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 25 Years
Must have maximum age of 49 Years
exclusion_criteria:
1. Women under 25 or over 49 years of age
2. Women not undergoing cervical biopsy or LEEP
3. Women who are pregnant
